name: McCafe
description: It serves Espresso Coffees, Iced Coffees, Teas and Frappés... don't forget to enjoy with the featured cakes, Ciabatta and selected bakeries.
description_zh: 它提供濃咖啡，冰咖啡，茶和法式蛋糕……不要忘記品嚐特色蛋糕，恰巴塔和精選麵包店。

location.address: LG5, Hong Kong University of Science and Technology, Sai Kung
location.address_zh: 香港科技大學LG5，西貢

name: Pacific Coffee
description: Operated by the Pacific Coffee Company Limited, The Coffee Corner dishes up a wide array of fare; from muffins and different types of pastry in the morning, through to Panini, packed salad and more for lunch and dinner. In addition, a variety of gourmet coffee and chillino provide a welcome respite throughout the day, where users can relax outdoors or mingle with each other.
description_zh: 由太平洋咖啡有限公司經營的“咖啡角”提供各種美食； 從早上的鬆餅和不同類型的糕點，到Panini，包裝好的沙拉，以及更多的午餐和晚餐。 此外，全天候，各種各樣的美食咖啡和辣椒為您提供了令人欣慰的休息時光，用戶可以在戶外放鬆身心或相互交流。

location.address: G/F, LSK Business Building, Hong Kong University of Science and Technology, Sai Kung
location.address_zh: 香港科技大學LSK商業大樓地下

name: Starbucks Coffee
description:
Starbucks offers a range of exceptional products that customers enjoy in our stores, at home, and on the go.
Coffee: More than 30 blends and single-origin premium coffees.
Handcrafted Beverages: Fresh-brewed coffee, hot and iced espresso beverages, Frappuccino® coffee and non-coffee blended beverages, Starbucks Refreshers® beverages, smoothies and teas.
Merchandise: Coffee- and tea-brewing equipment, Verismo® System by Starbucks, mugs and accessories, packaged goods, books and gifts.
Fresh Food: Baked pastries, sandwiches, salads, salad and grain bowls, oatmeal, yogurt parfaits and fruit cups.
description_zh:
星巴克提供了一系列出色的產品，客戶可以在我們的商店，家中和旅途中享用。
咖啡：30多種混合咖啡和單源優質咖啡。
手工飲料：現煮咖啡，冷熱特濃咖啡，星冰樂®咖啡和非咖啡混合飲料，星巴克Refreshers®飲料，冰沙和茶。
商品：咖啡和茶釀造設備，星巴克的Verismo®System，杯子和配件，包裝的商品，書籍和禮品。
新鮮食品：烘焙糕點，三明治，色拉，色拉和穀物碗，燕麥片，酸奶凍糕和水果杯。

location.address: G/F, Hong Kong Jockey Club Atrium, near Lift 3
location.address_zh: 香港賽馬會中庭地下靠近3號電梯

name: China Garden
description: The G/F Restaurant is a bookable venue which provides full table service with a comprehensive seasonal menu of Chinese dishes and other special functions, including cocktail receptions, banquets and buffets. This premise is issued with a Liquor Licence by the Liquor Licensing Board.

location.address: G/F, Academic Building, Hong Kong University of Science and Technology, Clear Water Bay, Sai Kung
location.address_zh: 西貢清水灣香港科技大學學術大樓地下

name: UniBistro
description: The restaurant and bar will offer a predominantly Mediterranean cuisine including a daily salad bar with pasta or pizza. In the evening the restaurant and bar will also offer tempting food choices, a variety of mocktails to complement the traditional bar all of which can be enjoyed whilst watching a variety of live and rerun sports games including English Premier League, NBA, rugby, tennis & cricket.

location.address: G/F, Lo Ka Chung University Center, The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology, Clear Water Bay, Sai Kung
location.address_zh: 西貢清水灣香港科技大學盧家驄大學中心地舖

name: UniQue
description: A stylish restaurant with panoramic sea views, a sensational bar and a patio for al fresco dining, UniQue acts as a faculty clubhouse, providing a casual, friendly ambiance for university academics, staff and guests. The well-varied menu offers something for everyone, with options that includes international dishes and local favorites, health-conscious meals, and vegan, dairy-free and gluten-free items.

location.address: 2/F, Li Dak Sum Yip Yio Chin Kenneth Li Conference Lodge, The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology, Clear Water Bay, Sai Kung
location.address_zh: 西貢清水灣香港科技大學李達三葉耀珍伉儷李本俊會議大樓2樓

location.address: 1/F, Woo Chia Wei Academic Concourse, The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology, Clear Water Bay, Sai Kung
location.address_zh: 西貢清水灣香港科技大學吳家瑋學術廊1樓

name: McDonalds
description: It serves burgers, French fries, fried chicken wings, extra value breakfast & extra value meal.
description_zh: 它提供漢堡，炸薯條，炸雞翅，超值早餐和超值餐。

location.address: LG5/F, Academic Building, Hong Kong University of Science and Technology, Clear Water Bay, Sai Kung
location.address_zh: 西貢清水灣香港科技大學學術大樓LG5樓

name: Passion
description:
The name of the shop Passion echoes the lifelong passion of owner Gerard Dubois, a Swiss-born pastry chef, for delivering top-quality products. Here, patrons seeking a traditional French cafe experience can sit back to savour a crispy oven-to-plate baguette with a rich chocolat chaud, in a homey country cottage decor and the aroma of freshly baked bread.

Every deli sandwiches created in the shop is prepared with selective homemade artisan bread made in house. A light evening menu is available for diners graving for casual yet tasty meal. For the health-conscious customers, the salad counter is never lack of choice. All salads, sandwiches, bakeries and pastries are available for take-away and sit-in dining.

location.address: Chia-Wei Woo Academic Concourse, 1/F Academic Building, Hong Kong University of Science and Technology, Clear Water Bay, Sai Kung
location.address_zh: 西貢清水灣香港科技大學學術大樓1樓吳家瑋學術廊

name: Subway
description: All sandwiches are prepared on a variety of freshly baked breads, with your choice of cold cuts or Veggie Delite. Top off your selection with your choice of vegetables and condiments. Moreover, you can check out in-depth nutritional information on any sub they made.

location.address: G/F, Cheng Yu Tung Building, Hong Kong University of Science and Technology, Clear Water Bay, Sai Kung
location.address_zh: 西貢清水灣香港科技大學鄭裕彤樓地下

name: Can.teen II
description: Embellished with a minimalist and modern design, the casual diners’ experience at the new LG1 Restaurant is taken to a whole new level. You will find your much-loved food served up in one convenient location.  Boasting a selection of local and regional cuisines, the LG1 Restaurant promises an optimum marriage of flavour, variety and comfort.  Favorites include hotplate-fried meats complete with rice from “Teppanyaki”; irresistible HK Roast from “Supreme BBQ”; authentic Japanese Ramen and set meals from “Japanese Counter”, nourishing vegetarian dishes from “Veggies” and quintessential buns from “Bistro Salon”.
description_zh: 以極簡主義和現代設計為點綴，新LG1餐廳的休閒食客體驗被提升到了一個全新的高度。 您會在一個方便的位置找到自己喜歡的食物。 LG1餐廳提供各種當地和區域美食，保證將風味，多樣性和舒適性完美結合。 最喜歡的包括鐵板燒配米飯的鐵板炒肉； 來自“至尊燒烤”的不可抗拒的香港烤肉； 正宗的日本拉麵和來自“日本櫃檯”的套餐，來自“素食主義者”的素食菜餚和來自“ Bistro沙龍”的典型麵包。

location.address_zh: 西貢清水灣香港科技大學學術大樓LG1樓
